discussion_comments.comment_body: should be default off due to the audio recording

discussion_comments.comment_body:
I propose moving the defaults here as an optional argument

https://github.com/commaai/openpilot/blob/bc7d6f2677a815ae316344038e627ed6dbe0051e/system/manager/manager.py#L36
